member.summary: AppUserModelID (to be used for Windows 7 or newer).

remarks.para: According to MSDN, an AppUserModelID must be in the following form: CompanyName.ProductName.SubProduct.VersionInformation It can have no more than 128 characters and cannot contain spaces.
